casebody.data:
WALSTON
v.
DUKE UNIVERSITY 246P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 17, 2019 Matthew D. Harbin, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Walston, Margarita. Jennifer Morris Jones, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Duke University. Carl Newman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Duke University. Michael F. Roessler, Attorney at Law, for Walston, Margarita.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of July 2019 by Defendant's Attorney Carl Newman to Withdraw as Counsel of Record:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of July 2019."
